articles.title: Elon Musk’s massive pay packet approval could be a lesson for business leaders
articles.description: Tesla’s shareholders still believe in the magic of their chief executive, but critics say  the bumper payday has warped some of the company’s decisions.
articles.content:
Elon Musk has scored a major victory, with Tesla investors reaffirming their decision to award their leader a record-setting, multibillion-dollar compensation package.
